summary: This is an email chain from April 29, 2020, between individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling a call to address forfeiture issues related to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings and coordination within the prosecution team.

persons.name: Mara
persons.context: Addressed in the email chain regarding scheduling a call about Epstein case forfeiture issues.

events.title: Scheduled call on Epstein forfeiture issues
events.description: A call is being scheduled between members of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to discuss forfeiture issues related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated April 29, 2020, concerning the Epstein case.
The communication is between individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The purpose is to schedule a call to discuss forfeiture issues related to the Epstein case, indicating active post-conviction or post-death legal proceedings.
The email identifies an individual named 'Mara' as a participant in the discussion.
The correspondence shows internal coordination within the prosecution team handling the Epstein case.
